type.name: org.gradle.api.distribution.Distribution
type.description: * A distribution allow to bundle an application or a library including dependencies,sources...

method.name: contents
getBaseName
method.description:
* The baseName of the distribution, used in naming the distribution archives. *

* If the {@link #getName()} of this distribution is "{@code main}" this defaults to the project's name. * Otherwise it is "{@code $project.name-$this.name}".

method.name: setBaseName
method.description:
* The baseName of the distribution. *

* Set to change the name of the distribution archives.

property.name: baseName
property.description:
* The baseName of the distribution, used in naming the distribution archives. *

* If the {@link #getName()} of this distribution is "{@code main}" this defaults to the project's name. * Otherwise it is "{@code $project.name-$this.name}".
